tool_description: Search by address or zipcode access to walkability, cycling and public transit scores for a given area.
name: OpenNWI
title: OpenNWI

api_list.name: GetScores
api_list.description: Search for scores by address or zip code.

api_list.name: GetScoreDetails
api_list.description:
Search score details by rankID.
**Key**:
- d2a: The mix of employment types and occupied housing.
- d2b: The mix of employment types in a block group
- d3b: Street intersection density
- d4a: workers who carpool
- bikeShareRank: Ranking (out of 20) for quality of public bikeshare services in the region
